# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (no other mining drills found)
-  Inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) waiting for source items
-  Inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5) with no fuel

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Stone furnace (position x=60.0, y=-60.0) with no ingredients

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5) working
-  Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0) with no fuel
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5) not connected
-  Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5) empty
-  Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5) full output

### Transport belt system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5) empty
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5) working
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5) working

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities have no fuel
-  Ensure that entities which require fuel have a sufficient fuel supply before starting operations.
-  Regularly check the status of entities to prevent fuel depletion.

### Errors when entities have no ingredients
-  Ensure that entities which require ingredients have a sufficient supply of ingredients before starting operations.
-  Regularly check the status of entities to prevent ingredient depletion.

### Errors when entities are not connected
-  Ensure that entities which require connections (e.g. steam engines) are properly connected before starting operations.
-  Regularly check the status of entities to prevent disconnections.

### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
-  Ensure that entities which require electricity (e.g. electricity groups) are properly plugged into the electric network before starting operations.
-  Regularly check the status of entities to prevent disconnections from the electric network.

### Errors when belts are empty
-  Ensure that belts have a sufficient supply of items to transport before starting operations.
-  Regularly check the status of belts to prevent depletion of items.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
No failure or success modes have been observed.
